attributes.action: Ban Alcohol from the House of Commons & Lords
attributes.additional_details: In modern UK most companies banned employees from drinking whilst at work years ago and both the Commons & Lords should ban alcohol from the estate as it is inappropriate that members are making important decisions afte having alcohol drinks. The Commons & Lords should set an example to all the people in the UK not say you must no do it but we can.  In addition the tax payers should not be paying for this, it is no longer affordable or appropriate behaviour in the work place.
